oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-05-03 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 3, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys (including Howdy Forrester, June Webb, Bashful Brother Oswald, and Jimmy Riddle), guest performer Benny Martin, and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, June Carter, and Pap's Jug Band. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 969th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jimmy Riddle; June Carter; Benny Martin; Bashful Brother Oswald; Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys; Pap's Jug Band; Howdy Forrester
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Fox Chase (Jimmy Riddle harmonica) -- Roy Acuff introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert commercial (Benny Martin, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Roy Acuff introduces Benny Martin -- Me And My Fiddle (Benny Martin) -- Roy Acuff introduces Bashful Brother Oswald -- Good Old Mountain Dew (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Roy Acuff talks -- They Cut Down The Old Pine Tree (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys, Pap's Jug Band) -- Leather Britches (Howdy Forrester fiddle) -- Closing statement (Roy Acuff, Howdy Forrester) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; United States.
